title: Oshosondy
author: Oshosondy
content: This is the topic: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5456243.msg62400423#msg62400423The support analysis is correct because in days now, bitcoin price dropped to $25350 three times but as not been going below. But the user refer us to a website. The scam possible website: https://cryptoaltum.com/en/blog/market-analysis/technical-analysis-btcusd-13.06.2023QuoteHave Questions? We're available 24/7 to help you. You can email us, or send us a message on WhatsApp, Telegram or Messenger!I do not know how they will be available 24/7 without anything they are gaining from anyone. I see this as a way people will contact them and they will advice the people to pay money for signals or to help them to trade. I would have made my post under the topic to warn people, but the user lock the topic.Please report this topic to be be deleted.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on June 14, 2023, 08:57:56 AMI do not know how they will be available 24/7 without anything they are gaining from anyone. I see this as a way people will contact them and they will advice the people to pay money for signals or to help them to trade. I would have made my post under the topic to warn people, but the user lock the topic.Please report this topic to be be deleted.Reported it, locking the thread without giving anyone a chance to comment or give their views is already a red flag, I agree with your assessment if you have prior experience on this kind of platform I'm sure you know what's coming so I support your call to report it, we have a saying prevention is better than cure.

comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: Well every sites will claim their live support are available for 24/7 regardless it's legit or scam, you can't judge only because of this reason. If there's an user suggest anyone to join their website or telegram to get their signal, it's always scam.A legit one should proof it in this forum for transparency.The topic has been deleted, now it's your turn to lock this topic.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: Despairo on June 14, 2023, 10:37:33 AMWell every sites will claim their live support are available for 24/7 regardless it's legit or scam, you can't judge only because of this reason. If there's an user suggest anyone to join their website or telegram to get their signal, it's always scam.They have nothing to offer, then why customer support? It is a scam. One thing I have noticed about scam, they look for ways that people will not know they are driving towards being scammed. Quote from: Despairo on June 14, 2023, 10:37:33 AMThe topic has been deleted, now it's your turn to lock this topic.That is true, the topic has been deleted. I will lock this thread now.
